complaint.description: Worst customer support experience. Tried to change debit order date but system didn't update correctly. Now in arrears and unable to change date without payment.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer support and ensure system updates accurately.

meta.review_title: Worst customer support experience I've ever had.
meta.review_content:
A broken system.

I tried to change my debit order date in advance to avoid penalties and ensure that the debit order will go through.

After trying to speak to a consultant numerous times they kept redirecting me to their "bot" system. On the bot system I was able to make the changes to the new date of witch the debit order should go off.

Now I am being told that the system never updated with the correct date, so I am in arrears and for that the can't change the date as I need to pay first.

So then why the hell did I go though all that effort to try and change the date to avoid all this nonsense just for them to not care. I just got off the phone with Vodacom collection telling me so be it I need to pay as the debit order failed, regardless if If I tried to change the date to ensure that it won't.

I must be honest, Vodacom has the worst support I've ever seen and I work in a service delivery environment.

Unbelievable how careless and arrogant they can be, the less work they have to do to resolve the case the longer they can sit around and do nothing.
